name: Don't lose your ball
description:
Don't lose your ball

is the title of my game and you are playing a litte boy that is lost in the forest and goblins are trying to kill you but you only have one life and one ball.

You can pick this ball back up again with E after you have thrown it.

Controlls:

wasd= moving but also shooting Direction

LeftMouseButton = shooting

E = Grabbing the ball back up
